text: That makes sense. To help streamline this, can you start enforcing a rule that customers must email from the address associated with their profile or purchase? This should help reduce the number of duplicate contacts.

Also another point, there should always be a single channel as in incoming emails since how seems more like a process oriented issue that’s leading to that. Faced that before and I completely see the issue you’re raising.

Hi <@U07C2KVBMGX> I'm not sure if HubSpot starter allows you to make private apps (which is basically like an API key), but if you can create a private app, you should be able to run deduplication code on your PC in the VSCode terminal
